title: Presidential Nomination Sent to the Senate, 5/17/10 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 17, 2010

 



Presidential Nomination Sent to the Senate, 5/17/10




NOMINATION SENT TO THE SENATE:
John S. Pistole, of Virginia, to be an Assistant Secretary of Homeland Security, vice Edmund S. Hawley, resigned.
